title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - February 10, 2022
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - February 10, 2022
description:
Mark and Gary link up remotely from their respective homes to discuss the developments in Sarah Palin's ongoing trial against the New York Times as well as some reporting out of CNN today regarding former President Trump's time in the White House.

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
